backend/main.mo: Defines actor types and structures for lobbies, tournaments, user profiles, transactions, and game states using AccessControl, storage mixins, and various Motoko core modules.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend hooks, components, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application shell handling authentication, admin checks, game mode selection, navigation tabs, and quick‑play flow within a React Query–powered layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin settings panel with placeholders for house‑cut configuration, system statistics, and live deployment status helpers.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: UI badge showing backend connectivity status using useActorWithRetry, with tooltips for connection, retry, and error states.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal for handling deposit and future withdrawal actions, validating wallet state and initiating Flexa deposits with status polling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: Provides guidance on publishing an app live on the Internet Computer, including links and deployment explanations.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with game mode selection and wallet connection controls, including deposit and withdrawal modals.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Displays current site origin, public ICP link, and canister build metadata with copy and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: UI for browsing lobbies and launching quick-play games for Spades or Omaha.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder lobby room component indicating multiplayer features are under development.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating player profiles for online or offline modes, saving data to backend or local storage.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Main wrapper that initializes and renders either a Spades or Omaha quick‑play session using session state and gameplay handlers.
frontend/src/components/spades/SpadesSco: React scoreboard component for Spades showing player scores, penalties, and compact/full views with optional sticky layout.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Displays tournament information and UI badges, adjusting messaging based on game mode (forFun or forReal).
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Modal for connecting via WalletConnect, showing QR codes, deep links, errors, and connection status.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Prompts users to install a browser wallet like Coinbase or MetaMask when none is detected.
frontend/src/components/WalletPickerModa: Modal allowing users to choose a wallet type (Coinbase, MetaMask, WalletConnect, or guest) and initiate connection.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Wallet management panel for real‑money mode, handling network checks, balances, and deposit/withdraw flows based on connection state.
Provides a React context wrapper for wallet connection state and exposes methods from useWeb3Wallet.
frontend/src/games/omaha/bots.ts: Implements simple Omaha bot behavior choosing between check, bet, call, or fold based on game state.
frontend/src/games/omaha/engine.ts: Defines Omaha game initialization, deck creation, shuffling, hand progression, and action validation functions.
frontend/src/games/omaha/handEvaluator.t: Evaluates Omaha hands by checking all valid card combinations and ranking five‑card hands with tiebreakers.
frontend/src/games/omaha/OmahaCommunityB: Displays Omaha community cards with reveal logic based on betting street and fallback when cards are missing.
frontend/src/games/omaha/types.ts: Contains type definitions for Omaha cards, players, game state, and helper functions for card text and suit color.
frontend/src/games/session/quickPlaySess: Manages quick‑play sessions for Spades and Omaha, routing actions and bot turns to the appropriate engine.
frontend/src/games/spades/bots.ts: Implements basic Spades bot logic for selecting legal cards and generating bidding heuristics.
frontend/src/games/spades/engine.ts: Implements Spades game setup, including deck creation, shuffling, dealing, bidding, and starting new hands.
frontend/src/games/spades/scoring.ts: Provides scoring logic for Spades, including hand scoring, target checks, and winner determination.
frontend/src/games/spades/types.ts: Defines core Spades types for cards, players, tricks, penalties, and game state utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using identity, refreshing dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with retry, connection state tracking, and user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, build metadata, and Flexa deposit operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickPlaySession.t: Manages quick-play game sessions, handling bot actions, bidding, and card play with async processing and state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnect.ts: Implements WalletConnect lifecycle including initialization, connection, approval, disconnection, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: Provides unified Web3 wallet management across injected wallets, WalletConnect, and a guest wallet, syncing state and balances.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, gradients, scrollbar styling, and custom card UI styles.
frontend/src/lib/walletconnect.ts: Wraps WalletConnect SignClient to initialize, connect, manage sessions, disconnect, and send requests.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Contains Base chain config and metadata with a placeholder for future Web3Modal integration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/qrcode.d.ts: Empty declaration file reserved for QR code type definitions.
frontend/src/utils/ethFormat.ts: Provides BigInt‑safe utilities to parse wei to ETH and format ETH balances.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Provides utilities to detect the current canister ID from various sources, build IC gateway URLs, get site origin, and copy text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/sleep.ts: Implements a simple Promise-based sleep function for delaying async actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS themes, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, features, and deployment concerns for the multiplayer crypto gambling card game.
